thread.title: Mother and newborn baby found dead at house after concern for their welfare
thread.title_full: Mother and newborn baby found dead at house after concern for their welfare

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Mother and newborn baby found dead at house after concern for their welfare
text:
Police were called to a house in Brentwood, Essex (Picture: Google Street View) A woman and her two-month-old baby have been found dead at a house.
Police were called to a property in Brentwood, Essex, following concerns for the welfare of the 36-year-old mother and her child.
They were both pronounced dead at the scene by paramedics shortly after 3.20pm on Sunday.
Police said their deaths are currently being treated as unexplained but not suspicious.
The East of England Ambulance Service has also been approached for comment.
